contextId.occurrenceNote: This was about 3,000 liters of olive oil. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bvolume]])
contextId.glQuote: A hundred baths of olive oil

contextId.occurrenceNote: You may convert this to a modern measure. Alternate translation: "twenty thousand liters of wheat" or "a thousand baskets of wheat" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bvolume]])
